title: Google to cut some of its perks to cut costs amid AI race
description: Google is famous for its free food and bountiful perks. After laying off thousands of workers, some of those perks are being cut as the company trims costs.

title: Frost Giant wants to build a real-time strategy game for everyone
description: "Stormgate" may be a real successor to the RTS greats of yore — and the closest thing to a Warcraft and StarCraft sequel in years.

title: What Launcher meant, and means, for games journalism
description: Attention to a part of our world as massive and influential as gaming is not optional. It is essential.

title: Italy temporarily bans ChatGPT over privacy concerns
description: The Italian data protection agency cited concerns about privacy and the absence of age checks with the artificial-intelligence chatbot.

title: How you can tell the Puffy Coat Pope was an AI fake
description: Here are five clues to spot AI-generated images and why we shouldn't freak out about them.

title: Virgin Orbit to lay off 85 percent of staff and pause operations
description: The rocket company failed to secure enough money from investors to continue funding its operations at the current level.

title: Twitter’s blue check mark was loved and loathed. Now it’s pay for play.
description: Twitter verification is ending for people awarded blue checks under an old system, the company says, the latest shift under CEO Elon Musk.

title: How a fake Nashville manifesto fueled anti-trans rage online
description: The fake highlights how trolls and liars can use computer tools to muddle the truth about mass shootings.
